traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The serpentmaw can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The serpentmaw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the serpentmaw's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The serpentmaw makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage, or 17 (4d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage if the serpentmaw had advantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage.
